title: Development of Formative Assessment-Based Educational Materials for Understanding the Culture of the Bangka Region, Indonesia

context.prior_knowledge: Basic tourism knowledge and ability to perform simple cultural comparison analysis
context.additional_context: Blended classroom environment centered on reading material analysis and group discussions using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can describe three core characteristics of Bangka regional culture (e.g., traditional crafts, local festivals, historical heritage)
Learners can write culturally contextualized tourism guide sentences through formative assessments (reading tests and peer feedback)
Learners can finalize drafts of culture-based tourism product planning projects using developed educational materials

resources: English/Indonesian literature on Bangka regional culture

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
